channel.title: Snakebytes - Category - Don't take my word for it, but...

item.title: Snake bytes: Python's self
item.author: Robert ten Brincke
item.description: The scope of Python’s self includes class variables.

item.title: Snake bytes: Python's enum
item.author: Robert ten Brincke
item.description: Python’s enums tripped me up on my first encounter mostly because of the value assignment syntax.

item.title: Snake bytes: Python's tuple syntax
item.author: Robert ten Brincke
item.description: Python’s tuple syntax surprisingly relies on a combination of commas and parentheses.

item.title: Snake bytes: Python's take on scope
item.author: Robert ten Brincke
item.description: Python’s take on scopes is quite different from that in other languages.
